ProductInfo.Features:
GW8608H: Professional 8 Channel H.264 DVR, iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. 16 bit true color graphical menu interface; embedded real-time Linux operation system. Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance. USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW531H: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:     GW8608H DVR with 2TB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     6 x GW531H - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera;
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 3 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x 12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras; 1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHV7 8 Channel H.264 DVR with 6 x 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera 650 TVL 3.6mm Lens 24 IR LEDs Surveillance, Free Monitor (Black)
